text: A Wedding is a 1978 American comedy movie directed by Robert Altman and stars Carol Burnett, Paul Dooley, Mia Farrow, Lillian Gish, Geraldine Chaplin, Howard Duff, Lauren Hutton and Dennis Franz. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1978 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Altman Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies about social class Category:Movies set in country houses Category:Movies set in Illinois Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies about weddings Category:American satirical movies
title: A Wedding (1978 movie)
